CVE-2023-1234.name: Outdated OpenSSH Version
CVE-2023-1234.description: OpenSSH version before 7.9 contains multiple vulnerabilities
CVE-2023-1234.remediation: Update OpenSSH to version 7.9 or later

CVE-2023-1235.name: Weak SSL/TLS Configuration
CVE-2023-1235.description: Server uses weak SSL/TLS cipher suites
CVE-2023-1235.remediation: Update SSL/TLS configuration to use strong cipher suites
